title: 2007 MAAC men's basketball tournament
data: The 2007 MAAC men's basketball tournament was held March 2–5 at The Arena at Harbor Yard in Bridgeport, CT.[1] Second-seeded Niagara defeated Siena in the championship game, 83–79, to win their first MAAC men's basketball tournament. The Purple Eagles received an automatic bid to the 2007 NCAA tournament. All ten of the conference's members participated in the tournament field. They were seeded based on regular season conference records.
